Medicinal plants are considered for the treatment of diseases and recovery of vital energy, which is believed to gradually dissipate throughout life. So, it is important to conserve it using diet, kung fu, breathing exercises, and herbal medicines. As an example, fatigue is due to qi deficiency, and P. ginseng (tonic herb) activates qi and therefore has nourishing effects in fatigue.
